text: I’m working on the *HubSpot CMS for Developers* cert… I’m on the practicum and I’m looking for guidance. The instructions explicitly say to NOT use the boilerplate CSS, BUT it also wants grid-based drag-and-drop… The grid stuff comes from the boilerplate layout and CSS and I REALLY don’t want to have to reinvent the wheel and/or use some other grid-based stuff to try to get this working… Help? <@U3PKJ8EQL> <@U02227D27V3>
You can use the grid layout stuff from the boilerplate, pretty sure it even recommends it if you read carefully.
